page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Nearly all the men in the area are fully employed. 30% of them work on the land, farming. 15% in land related jobs such as forestry or game-keeping. 55% travel to nearby towns to work, their jobs include teaching, local government posts, factory workers, office jobs in the private sector retailing and building industry. Older woman and those with very young children do not go out to work. Most with older children do some part-time work in such jobs as teaching,shop work, banking, housework, office work, and crafts. A few woman with grownup families work fulltime as teachers, or in offices and factories. All school- leavers are able to find work in the area.
